content:
I found a bug in our pretty printer:
https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/issues/11252

Is it right that I reported it in the Mathlib repository? It happens with the @[pp_dot] tag. Or should it be reported in the Lean repository instead?
This is a known issue with mathlib's @[pp_dot], and it's mentioned in its documentation.
Ideally a correct version of pp_dot will become part of core Lean at some point
My bad — I should have read the docs!
Martin Dvořák has marked this topic as resolved.
